mapper.select: select * from user_info where id =#{id} and pw =#{pw}
select b.b_num, b.b_title, b.b_date, b.b_cont, b.b_file, u.o_num from board b, user_info u where b.o_num = u.o_num and b.o_num = #{o_num}
select c.store, c.o_num, b.b_num from board b, cafe_info c where b.o_num = c.o_num and b.b_num = #{b_num}
select * from cafe_info where store like '%'||#{store}||'%'
select u.id, s.s_date, s.stamp,s.o_num from user_info u, coupon s where u.id = s.id and s.o_num = #{o_num} order by s.s_date desc, u.id
select u.id, sum(s.stamp), s.o_num from user_info u, coupon s where u.id = #{id} and u.id = s.id and s.o_num = #{o_num} group by u.id, s.o_num
